message.entry: The file {0} does not exist.
The file {0} is not a NIfTI file. Specify either .nii/.hdr, or gzipped versions of these files.
Input {0} must be a .hdr or .hdr.gz file.
Input {0} file must be a .img or .img.gz file.
The specified file is a NITF file. Consider using nitfinfo.
Cannot unzip file. tempdir needs write permissions and sufficient free space.
The metadata structure specified does not contain valid data.
Cannot find the image or header files.
Cannot find corresponding image or header file.
The input volume must be specified as a numeric matrix.
The input filename must be specified as a string or a character vector.
Intent name must be less than 16 characters.
Auxiliary file name must be less than 24 characters.
Description must be less than 80 characters.
Volume size does not match header size specified.
Volume class does not match header class specified.
NIfTI-1 files must be of size 32767 or less in all dimensions.
Version must either be 'NIfTI1' or 'NIfTI2'.
The specified transform is not supported.
The specified slice code is not supported.
The specified intent code is not supported.
The specified space unit is not supported.
The specified time unit is not supported.
The specified image data type is not supported.
Cannot open NIfTI file for header read: fopen failed.
Cannot open file for writing header.
Cannot open NIfTI file: headerSize is not 348 or 540.
Number of voxels written does not match the volume contents.
Cannot open NIfTI file for image read: fopen failed.
Image size does not match header description.
